org.apache.stanbol.client.contenthub.store.model

Class ContentItem

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.stanbol.client.contenthub.store.model.ContentItem

  • public class ContentItem
extends java.lang.Object
    This class represent a Content Item retrieved from any index of Stanbol's ContentHub component
    Author:
    efoncubierta, Rafa Haro
